Dcmtk module¶

class Dcmtk.Dcmtk(scriptDirectory, dcmtkDirectory, peer, port)¶

Bases: object

Base class for communication with PACS Server (Orthanc)

cEcho()¶

Sends C-ECHO command to assert connection with PACS Server

Returns

Return type

runStatus

cGet(patientID, outputDir)¶

Sends C-GET command to retrieve file/s from PACS Server

Parameters

outputDir (string) – Path to location where DICOM files are to be downloaded

Returns

Return type

runStatus

cStore(filePath, individualFile=True)¶

Sends C-STORE command to upload file/s into PACS Server

Parameters

  • filePath (file) – Path to input DICOM file or file directory which is to be uploaded into PACS Server

  • individualFile (bool) – True means filePath is individualFile. False means filePath is file directory containing many .dcm

Returns

Return type

runStatus

readHelpFunction(command)¶

Sends command to get help information for provided command and display on command line

Parameters

command (str) – Command that user wants information on

Returns

Return type

None

runByCmdExe(command)¶

Runs any command on command line based on passed in parameters

Parameters

command (arr) – Array of strings that are joined together before being executed on command line

Returns

Return type

runStatus
